definition: lit. ninety li is merely a half of a hundred li journey (idiom)/fig. the closer one is to completing a task, the tougher it gets/a task is not done until it's done
pinyin: xing2 bai3 li3 zhe3 ban4 jiu3 shi2

definition: walk a hundred steps after each meal and you will live a long life (proverb)
pinyin: fan4 hou4 bai3 bu4 zou3 , huo2 dao4 jiu3 shi2 jiu3
containing_words.word: 飯後百步走，活到九十九

sentences.english: The powers and functions of the district organizations and the method for their formation shall be prescribed by law.
sentences.chinese: 第九十八條區域組織的職權和組成方法由法律規定。
今天，在九十八個國家運作。

sentences.english: Bajiu Shi - year - old man , nature as a child , to care too much?
sentences.chinese: 八九十歲的老人，性情就像孩子，能太計較麼？

sentences.english: If a man owns a hundred sheep, and one of them wanders away, will he not leave the ninety-nine on the hills and go to look for the one that wandered off?
sentences.chinese: 他豈不撇下這九十九隻，往山裏去找那隻迷路的羊麼。

sentences.english: 99 percent of lawyers give the rest a bad name.
sentences.chinese: 百分之九十九的律師是毀壞律師界名聲的大老鼠。

sentences.english: Sana is a authoress of Daur who began her writing in early 1990's.
sentences.chinese: 薩娜是於九十年代初走上文壇的達斡爾族當代女作家。

sentences.english: Lars used to say that ninety percent of Saunière’s story is fiction.
sentences.chinese: 佬司常說尚尼亞故事的百分子九十是杜撰的。

sentences.english: And women who are more than ninety-one percent rate caries.
sentences.chinese: 而女性患齲率則超過百分之九十一。

sentences.english: Article 99. A board of directors is set up in a stock exchange.
sentences.chinese: 第九十九條證券交易所設理事會。

sentences.english: Article 62 After childbirth, female workers shall be entitled to no less than ninety days of maternity leaves with pay.
sentences.chinese: 第六十二條女職工生育享受不少於九十天的產假。

sentences.english: Gold was found in the nearby Yukon area of Canada in the eighteen nineties.
sentences.chinese: 十八世紀九十年代在加拿大育空地區附近發現黃金。

sentences.english: Section 62. After childbirth, female workers shall be entitled to no less than 90 days of maternity leaves with pay.
sentences.chinese: 第六十二條女職工生育享受不少於九十天的產假。

sentences.english: My daughter finished the exercises in lesson 96 this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上，我女兒完成了第九十六課的練習題。

sentences.english: Time of having a meal, 99 dragon horses declare.
sentences.chinese: 喫飯的時候，九十九龍馬宣佈着。

sentences.english: And if you didn't hold the pen exactly 3)vertical, it wouldn't write at all.
sentences.chinese: 而且你若沒把筆管握成九十度垂直，就完全寫不出來。

sentences.english: The old walled, there are several more than 90 years old, can work.
sentences.chinese: 寨裏的老人有幾個九十多歲了，還能勞作。
